action.content:
My brother is trying to install a new toilet in his bathroom. Could you give me details of how-to? You don't need to show all details -- just the first 5 steps for now. Separated them with "***", such as:
Step 1: ......
***
Step 2: ......
***
...

End your whole response with the phrase "Let me know how it works. I can give you next steps when you finish all steps above."
action.label: context

action.content:
Step 1: Turn off the water supply to the existing toilet by closing the shut-off valves located underneath the tank.
***
Step 2: Flush the toilet to drain any remaining water from the tank and the bowl.
***
Step 3: Disconnect the water supply line from the tank by loosening the nuts and removing the supply line.
***
Step 4: Remove the old toilet by loosening the bolts that secure the toilet to the floor. Use a wrench to remove these bolts.
***
Step 5: Clean the flange where the old toilet was mounted to remove any old wax seal residue.
***
Let me know how it works. I can give you next steps when you finish all steps above.<|end_of_text|>
action.label: response

startend:end_checker.end_phrase: Let me know how it works. I can give you next steps when you finish all steps above.
